name: @farazahmad759/dricup-crud-express
description: A CLI to bootstrap my new projects

scripts.git:promote-feature-to-development: git checkout development && git merge feature && git push origin development && git checkout feature
scripts.git:promote-development-to-main: git checkout main && git merge development && git push origin main && git checkout feature
scripts.git:promote-main-to-v0.1: git checkout v0.1 && git merge main && git push origin v0.1 && git checkout feature

author: Faraz Ahmad
